about_the_game:
The main game, 3D Visual Novel Maker, has 48 hairs, with this DLC you will get more hair types for your excellent artwork:

☑ Wind Warrior (60 color)
☑ Xelene (33 color)
☑ Punky Crest 01 (30 color)
☑ Punky Crest 02 (30 color)
☑ Punky 01 (30 color)
☑ Punky 02 (30 color)
☑ Punky puff (30 color)
☑ Punky spider (30 color)
☑ Nova (34 color)
☑ Kokoro (13 color)
☑ Kimmy (10 color)
☑ Caleela (29 color)
☑ Sara (20 color)
☑ Gem (25 color)
☑ Lyam BobHair (7 color)
☑ Haydina (30 color)
☑ Danny (17 color)
☑ Cynda (24 color)
☑ Ainsley (32 color)
☑ Tia (20 color)
☑ Agent (16 colors)
☑ Salsa (6 colors)
☑ Midnight Special (40 colors)
☑ Jazmine (68 colors)
☑ Isidora (40 colors)
☑ Grace Updo (5 colors)
☑ Edwardian (3 colors)
☑ Pandora (20 color)
☑ Ruby (20 color)
☑ Asher (20 color)
☑ Yvette (20 color)

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the character.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

name: Hairs for 3D Visual Novel Maker

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Hairs for 3D Visual Novel Maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor like i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 4GB VRAM like GTX 970
  • Storage: 34 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Create excellent 3D visual novels, comics, manga or story and became a famous novel maker
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil
